children.subject:
算法代码见 https://gist.github.com/tonygaosh/b68215a589547f541b0f4e7fbf3d594f 在选择算法的代码中加入 
        # do policy: should set currentBlock,
        if self.policy == 'FIFO':
            (self.currentBlock, self.currentIndex) = self.requestQueue[self.requestCount]
            self.DoSATF(self.requestQueue[self.requestCount:self.requestCount+1])
        elif self.policy == 'SATF' or self.policy == 'BSATF':
            (self.currentBlock, self.currentIndex) = self.DoSATF(self.requestQueue[0:self.GetWindow()])
        elif self.policy == 'SSTF':
            # first, find all the blocks on a given track (given window constraints)
            trackList = self.DoSSTF(self.requestQueue[0:self.GetWindow()])
            # then, do SATF on those blocks (otherwise, will not do them in obvious order)
            (self.currentBlock, self.currentIndex) = self.DoSATF(trackList)
        ####### My Code
        elif self.policy == 'CSCAN':
            (self.currentBlock, self.currentIndex) = self.DoCSCAN(self.requestQueue[0:self.GetWindow()])
        ####### My Code
        else:
            print 'policy (%s) not implemented' % self.policy
            sys.exit(1)
在测试时选择样例参数 
./disksim-homework.py -a 10,11,12,13 -G -p CSCAN -l 12,13,24,1,5,16,18,22
可以得到测试结果
请选择“CSCAN”的同学在此贴后面自己的回答结果。
请选择“LOOK”的同学在此贴后面自己的回答结果。

https://gist.github.com/mengcz13/e97e509dc0c614a0161df26bcdd64853

测试命令:

# -i参数指定了armTrack的初始位置
python ./disksim-homework.py -a 1,2,13,14,26,27 -cG -p CLOOK -i 2

测试结果:

OPTIONS seed 0
OPTIONS addr 1,2,13,14,26,27
OPTIONS addrDesc 5,-1,0
OPTIONS seekSpeed 1
OPTIONS rotateSpeed 1
OPTIONS skew 0
OPTIONS window -1
OPTIONS policy CLOOK
OPTIONS compute True
OPTIONS graphics True
OPTIONS zoning 30,30,30
OPTIONS lateAddr -1
OPTIONS lateAddrDesc 0,-1,0
OPTIONS initArmTrack 2

REQUESTS ['1', '2', '13', '14', '26', '27']

Block:  26  Seek:  0  Rotate:225  Transfer: 30  Total: 255
Block:  27  Seek:  0  Rotate:  0  Transfer: 30  Total:  30
Block:   1  Seek: 80  Rotate:190  Transfer: 30  Total: 300
Block:   2  Seek:  0  Rotate:  0  Transfer: 30  Total:  30
Block:  13  Seek: 40  Rotate:260  Transfer: 30  Total: 330
Block:  14  Seek:  0  Rotate:  0  Transfer: 30  Total:  30

TOTALS      Seek:120  Rotate:675  Transfer:180  Total: 975
请选择“C-LOOK”的同学在此贴后面自己的回答结果。
请选择“FSCAN”的同学在此贴后面自己的回答结果。

history.content:
题目：
https://chyyuu.gitbooks.io/os_course_exercises/content/all/10-1-spoc-discussion.html


小组思考题 -> 第2小题

完成磁盘访问与磁盘寻道算法的作业，然后实现CSCAN、LOOK、C-LOOK、FSCAN等磁盘调度算法中的一个。
history.subject: 2017春季-第二十三讲课堂实践练习
